name: @lukasbriza/homeport-infrastructure-apps
description: Infrastructure apps for homeport home lab.
author: https://github.com/lukasbriza

scripts.architecture-docker:build-local: dotenv -e architecture/jenkins/.env.local -e architecture/infisical/.env.local -e architecture/api-processor/.env.local -e architecture/nginx-proxy-manager/.env.local -- docker compose -f docker-compose-local.architecture.yaml build
scripts.architecture-docker:run-local: dotenv -e architecture/jenkins/.env.local -e architecture/infisical/.env.local -e architecture/api-processor/.env.local -e architecture/nginx-proxy-manager/.env.local -- docker compose -f docker-compose-local.architecture.yaml up --build -V -d
scripts.cleanup: turbo run cleanup --no-daemon && pnpm run postcleanup
scripts.core-docker:build-local: dotenv -e core/portainer/.env.local -e core/pi-hole/.env.local -- docker compose -f docker-compose-local.core.yaml --profile DNS build
scripts.core-docker:run-local: dotenv -e core/portainer/.env.local -e core/pi-hole/.env.local -- docker compose -f docker-compose-local.core.yaml --profile DNS up --build -V -d
